title: How is technical writing different from other writing? - Quora

response.answer_text: Question :- How does it rain on earth ??? (Technical) Let me tell you how it's rain and why. First of all its Due to the sun light and temperature, the water evaporates and goes in the sky where they accumulate and form clouds. Later they fall as rain. The evaporation and falling of rain continues and this bring us to the water cycle and blah blah blah.... (Other) It rain because mother earth need water and she may die due to dehydration.Yes there is water cycle but don't forget there is rain God too. I hope you get the difference
